title: 97: Augustine, The Great Hippo Lord
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this episode, we review the life and heresies of Augustine of Hippo, who's apparently far more relatable than OTHER saints I could mention.
itunes:author: Three Great Hippos
itunes:subtitle: He's just as territorial.
